author: Teortaxes (DeepSeek 推特铁粉 2023 – ∞) @teortaxesTex
text: I'm so giddy. V4 will be such a beautiful model. Generally, 2026 models will be dashing. We're seeing most primitives getting upgrades. Tokenizer, optimizer, encoding, router, attention, normalization, KV, losses… and the entire infrastructure from chips up, and data generation.
